page.title: 11Arts and Crafts
page.content: Truro houses a great number of small Art and craft industries,some of which rely on grants and assistance for amall businesses. Whilst Pottery seems to be the most popular of these,others such as leatherwork and basketry can also be found. The craftsmen are now organising themselves into guilds and co-operatives in order to meke a more successful venture. The County Museum and Art Gallery exhibits the collections of the Royal Institution of Cornwall. It also houses Cornish minerals, birds, pottery and historic furniture. In the Art Galleries are Opie paintings and drawings by Rubens, Canaletto, Constable and Gainsborough. County Hall houses an ever changing exhibition of children's two dimensional Art work.
